column1: Art Institute of Chicago////My point of references for Art Museums are the Philadelphia Museum of Art
column4: and the Museum of Modern Art. So when I think about art
column5: I think of those places first.  Let me tell you
column6: the Art Institute of Chicago is pretty amazing
column7: especially considering its location within its location.  The only drawback I can say is that its pretty spread out and difficult to navigate.  My favorite part though-- the food court.  It was surprisingly good.
